title: Restoring the Flow of Credit to Small Businesses
content: For release on delivery  10:00 a.m. EDT  July 12, 2010      Restoring the Flow of Credit to Small Businesses        Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Federal Reserve Meeting Series:  “Addressing the Financing Needs of Small Businesses”    Washington, D.C.                 July 12, 2010
